scripts.react:clean: npm uninstall --no-save react react-dom react-addons-test-utils react-test-renderer && rimraf node_modules/react-test-renderer node_modules/react && npm prune
scripts.react:14: rimraf node_modules/.bin/npm && npm run react:clean && npm i --no-save react@0.14 react-dom@0.14 react-addons-test-utils@0.14 && npm prune
scripts.react:15: rimraf node_modules/.bin/npm && npm run react:clean && npm i --no-save react@15 react-dom@15 react-addons-test-utils@15 react-test-renderer@15 && npm prune
